```{r}
download.file("http://tiny.cc/dcf/ScorecardSmall.Rda", destfile = "ScorecardSmall.Rda")
load("ScorecardSmall.Rda")
```

```{r}
ScorecardSmaller <- ScorecardSmall %>%
  filter(CONTROL != 3) %>%
  select(CONTROL, ADM_RATE, CCSIZSET, NPT41_PUB, NPT41_PRIV, NPT43_PUB, NPT43_PRIV, NPT45_PUB, NPT45_PRIV) %>%
  filter(!CCSIZSET %in% c(1, 6, 7, 8))
```

```{r}
ScorecardFamWealth <- ScorecardSmaller %>%
  gather(key=quintile, value=netcostperyear, NPT41_PUB, NPT41_PRIV, NPT43_PUB, NPT43_PRIV, NPT45_PUB, NPT45_PRIV) %>%
  mutate(Q = substr(quintile, 5, 5))
```

```{r}
ScorecardFamWealth %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=ADM_RATE, y = netcostperyear)) +
  geom_point(alpha=.04, color = "blue") +
  facet_grid(CONTROL ~ Q) +
  stat_smooth(se = FALSE, color = "black") +
  xlab("admissions rate, %") +
  ylab("net cost per year, $,000")
```
